titles.title: A bill to require the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to pay individuals who are owed educational assistance under the Post-9/11 Educational Assistance program the amounts of educational assistance that they are entitled to by law, and for other purposes.
Fix Immediately Outstanding Underpayments for Student Veterans Act of 2018
Fix Immediately Outstanding Underpayments for Student Veterans Act of 2018
Fix IOUs for Student Veterans Act of 2018
Fix IOUs for Student Veterans Act of 2018
Fix IOUs for Student Veterans Act of 2018

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
